activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#2635
activity.text:
@nihal467 @gigincg  it was because of /analyze endpoint not having permission for readOnly user for access.
Here is the issue at backend: [#813](https://github.com/coronasafe/care/issues/813)
and here is the PR fixing the issue: [#817](https://github.com/coronasafe/care/pull/817)

This PR converted /analuze endpoint from POST to GET so merging this PR at backend needs parallel changes at frontend. Once backend PR is approved I will make PR at frontend to make it compatible.
